General.Name: CoTec Holdings Corp.
General.Description: CoTec Holdings Corp. focuses on investment in technology in the mineral extraction industries and acquiring assets. The company intends to operate as mineral resource producer. It invests in technologies that have the potential to change the metals and minerals extracted and processed for the purpose of applying technologies to undervalue operating assets and recycling opportunities in rare earths, low carbon iron ore, and copper. CoTec Holdings Corp. was incorporated in 1986 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 755 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6Z 1X6

1.Name: Mr. Abraham Hendrik Jonker ACA (ICAEW), ACMA (UK), C.P.A., CA, CA (SA), CPA
